name: VideoScribe Project
summary: Learn about .SCRIBE files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: You can open a SCRIBE project in VideoScribe by selecting the import icon in the bottom left of the project screen, choosing the SCRIBE project you want to open, and then clicking Open.

You can create a SCRIBE project in VideoScribe by selecting the project you want to export, clicking the export icon in the bottom left of the project window, choosing the location to export the SCRIBE project, and then clicking Save.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
